SA19tarkrsau:2258: 'nahi sarve visvarasāḥ sphuṭaṃ sphurantī 'ti tatra dharmabhāvanāphalavarṇanam /
SA19tarkrsau:2259: kiṃ tarhi ? yat sphurati tat priyatvāśliṣṭam /
SA19tarkrsau:2260: tadvadihāpi yat kiñcid vastujātaṃ yātaṃ pratyakṣatām,
SA19tarkrsau:2271: 1] rthau duḥkhaṃ śūnyānātmākāraparikaritaṃ svaviṣayavijñānaṃ sphuṭaṃ janayataḥ /
SA19tarkrsau:2272: tena --- paramārthaviṣaye kṣaṇikatvādau cakṣurjñānamapi sad yogijñānam /
SA19tarkrsau:2274: cakṣurjñānaṃ ca mānasaṃ sat yogijñānaṃ cotpadyate --- gṛhītagrāhitvaṃ hi doṣo na gṛhyamāṇagrāhitvam /
SA19tarkrsau:2281: rāgādikleśaviśleṣāya paramapuruṣārthaghiyā samuddhu[346]rasyāpi kṣaṇikaparāvṛttpā kṣaṇikatvameva punaḥ puna[347]rāmṛśataḥ /
SA19tarkrsau:2287: yāvadasannihitatayā ākāreṇa kṣaṇikatvādikamālambyate tāvadiyaṃ bhāvanā kalpanātmikā /
SA19tarkrsau:2291: svapnenāpi manovedanavaiśa[348]dyanidānena noddīpayituṃ svapnavikalpasya śakyate sphuṭatvam /
SA19tarkrsau:2311: yattvasatyaṃ tat sphuṭaṃ saj jñānasya bhāvyamānaṃ hetuḥ svabhāvena,
SA19tarkrsau:2318: FN 3 der Seite o. Stellenangabe im Text
SA19tarkrsau:2334: 'viṣayagrahaṇaṃ dharmo vijñānasye 'ti vākyamatiricyeta --- asatyārthaṃ ca kiñcinna syāt ---
SA19tarkrsau:2423: yuktijñena sarvaṃ hi vastu sarvaiḥ vastubhiḥ sākṣāt pāramparyeṇa ca sambaddhaṃ budhyate yatnavatā krameṇa prakṛṣyamāṇam /
SA19tarkrsau:2428: sarva digbhavaiśca tādātmyakairupariṣṭād bhaviṣyadbhiśca upādeyasahakāryair antyavivarjitaiḥ sambaddhā /
SA19tarkrsau:2467: tad yathā -- yathāyathamarthasya sarvasya vācakaṃ sarvavākyam /
SA19tarkrsau:2468: tathā ca --- niḥśeṣasamastavastunairātmyādinivedanāya vākyam tathāgatasya bhagavataḥ kāryaheturayam /
SA19tarkrsau:2470: yaḥ kaścit paraiḥ sarva[369]vidaṃ pratyudbhāvito doṣaḥ,

SA19tarkrsau:2513: virodhādayo na vastubhūtāḥ sambandhāḥ / kim tarhi ?
SA19tarkrsau:2524: viparītā ca vastu svabhāvāvagāhinī veti vyavahārāṅgamaṅgīkṛtā /
SA19tarkrsau:2549: 'dṛṣṭatvānyathānupapattyāsvabuddhivedane sarvametad bhaviṣyatī' tyapi na yuktaḥ samādhiḥ /
SA19tarkrsau:2557: evaṃ tarhi, manobuddheḥ smaraṇarūpayoḥ padārthaprakaṭyaliṅgābhāvān nānumānam /
SA19tarkrsau:2565: yathāsvamindriyapratyakṣeṇa ceṣṭābhidhādikaṃ kāryatayā svasantāne niścitya paracittānumānamuktam /
SA19tarkrsau:2571: sarvathā anumāturasadṛśatvāt paracittasya pallavo[381]llāsanāt prabhañjanānumāne vānadṛśyāsti sindhumārutasyāntarbhāvo,

SA19tarkrsau:3060: tathā --- pārthe 'pi yadi rāmādiḥ kodaṇḍapāṇḍityaṃ paripiṇḍayet kaccit ?
SA19tarkrsau:3091: sāmānye na ca vyāptigrahe pakṣadharmasyāpi praviṣṭatvāt/

SA19tarkrsau:3173: [453][454] sādhyadharmasāmānyena samāno[455]'rthaḥ sapakṣaḥ tatraiva ca sattvaṃ dvitīyaṃ rūpam.

SA19tarkrsau:3178: [454] Y V: 145. Text für diesen Abschnitt nach Y V. Endnoten nach Shastri.
SA19tarkrsau:3181: ''anumeye sattvam eve''ty uktam. ''sapakṣa eva ca sattvam'' ity anyayogavyavacchedena nirasyate cakārāt,
SA19tarkrsau:3182: yathānaraṃ ca nārāyaṇam eva cādau svataḥ sutau dvau janayāṃ babhūve''ti.
SA19tarkrsau:3189: khyāpyate yatra dṛṣṭāntaḥ sa sādharmyetaro dvidhā / /''
SA19tarkrsau:3192: ''tatraiva ca[458]sattvam'' ity abhidhānāt tāvān evārthaḥ sampadyate.
SA19tarkrsau:3197: tato 'nyas tadviruddhas tadabhāvaś ca. tatrāsattvam eva niścitaṃ[459]tṛtīyaṃ rūpam.
SA19tarkrsau:3201: niścitagrahaṇaṃ triṣv api rūpeṣu draṣṭavyam. vahnisambaddhatvenānumeye[460]
SA19tarkrsau:3221: jñānam apy āttam evātra jñāpako 'dhikṛto yataḥ /
SA19tarkrsau:3222: ato[466]niścitatvaṃ na rūpāntaram. rūpāntaraṃ tad eveha vivakṣitam. yatra vivādas tatra pakṣadharme darśito vivādaḥ.
SA19tarkrsau:3238: na ca liṅgaṃ parokṣapratipattyaṅgam athavā niścitaṃ sad iti matam asti kasyacit.
SA19tarkrsau:3239_0: tasmād anvayavyatirekayor niścitavyāptikayor ekam api prayuktam arthāpattyā dvitīyam
SA19tarkrsau:3239_1: ākṣipati rūpam iti niyamavator anvayavyatirekayor niścitayor eka eva prayoktavya
SA19tarkrsau:3239_2: iti prayogaśikṣaṇārtham anvayavyatirekopādānam. yasmād yataḥ''sapakṣa eva ca[469]sattvam''
SA19tarkrsau:3240: kimarthaṃ kathyet''āsapakṣe cāsattvam eva niścitam'' iti.[470]tad evaṃ darśanādarśanamātreṇa na sidhyati sambandhaḥ.
SA19tarkrsau:3261: sādhyadharmasāmānyenā tulya[474]eva sadbhāvaḥ. anena cāvadhāraṇena labdho 'tattulye 'sadbhāvaḥ. tato 'nāstitāsatīti niyamārtham. siddhe saty ārambho niyamāye''ti nyāyāt.
SA19tarkrsau:3266: ''anumeye 'tha tattulye sadbhāvo nāstitāsatī''ty eva sūtraṃ gamitam ācāryeṇa niyamārtham. tathāpi prakṣepo vibhajyate. asaty eva nāstitā yathā syān nānyatra na viruddhe,
SA19tarkrsau:3267: tattulyatvena yaḥ san na bhavati so 'san tasmin ''nāstitaive''ty asamarthasamāsaphalam. tadanyas[475],
SA19tarkrsau:3268: tadviruddhas tadabhāvaś cety uktaṃ bhavati. tasmād āha ''nānyatraiva na viruddha eva ce''ti.
SA19tarkrsau:3273: [476]api tu anumeyaviparīte[477]sarvasmin yo nāsty eva sa hetuḥ,
SA19tarkrsau:3274_0: kutaḥ punar anyaviruddhayoḥ prasaktiḥ. ucyate. ''tattulya eva yo 'stī''ti niyamenātattulye[478]nāstitvam
SA19tarkrsau:3278: but tentatively inserted by the present writer. Cf. note 44 above.
SA19tarkrsau:3290: ''nāstitāsatī''ti vacanena punas tattulyatayā[484][485]yaḥ san na bhavati so 'tulyo grāhyaḥ.
SA19tarkrsau:3295: yāyaḥ. Cf. TR 82, 15-16: tattulyatvena yaḥ san na bhavati so 'san...
SA19tarkrsau:3297: evaṃ tarhi pūrveṇāsiddhatvād apūrvavidhānaṃ na niyamārthaṃ syāt. na.
SA19tarkrsau:3300_0: iti nyāyāt. asamarthasamāsa eva bhaviṣyaty ''atattulya'' iti. tathāpi ''nānyatra
SA19tarkrsau:3300_1: na viruddha'' iti vacanam aghaṭamānaṃ vā ghaṭamānaṃ kim asamarthasamāsena samartha
SA19tarkrsau:3300_2: evāstu samāsa iti codye doṣadarśanārthatvād iti.
SA19tarkrsau:3302: na, svavacanavirodhāt. asato 'dhikaraṇaśaktiṃ pratirundhāno yena vākyena tāṃ pratiruṇaddhi,
SA19tarkrsau:3325: dāhapākādisamartho hyartho jñātumiṣṭaḥ pākādyasamarthavyatirekī cānumānenārtho jñāpyate /
SA19tarkrsau:3326: ato bahavo[490]'rthāḥ sajātīyavyāvṛtter aniścitatvānniścitatvācca vijātīyavyāvṛtteḥ 'sāmānyami'ti vyapadiśyante /
SA19tarkrsau:3341: sādhyatā yāvadeva pra- vā- bhā- 499 pṛ - /
SA19tarkrsau:3355: ayoga[494]vyavacchedena viśeṣaṇe pakṣāyogavyavacchedaṃ sādhyamapāsyasāmānyenānvayadarśane tadviśiṣṭatvasiddhiratadrūpaparāvṛttatayaikatvasya vivakṣitatvāt pakṣadharmatvayogāt /
SA19tarkrsau:3377: pakṣadharmatārūpabalāt sāmānyena dharminā sambaddho vyāpako viśeṣaṇagharmiṇā sambandhād viśeṣaṇaṃ[498]pariṇamati /
SA19tarkrsau:3383: yadāpi --- pakṣadharmatāpūrvakaḥ prayogaḥ tadāpyayogavyavacchedena viśeṣaṇāt dharmimātrasambandhyeva vyāpakaṃ sāmānyaṃ sat viśiṣṭatāpratiṣṭhaṃ pratīyate ---
SA19tarkrsau:3385_0: 4] thā --- mahānasa' iti sādhyadharmasāmānyena dharmimātrayogavyavacchedaṃ smaratādhūmo
SA19tarkrsau:3388: yadyatropalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptaṃ sat nopalabhyate sa tatrāsadvyavahāraviṣayaḥ siddho yathā --- turaṅgamottamāṅge śṛṅgam /
SA19tarkrsau:3396: “nāsti padārtho 'bhāvo na ma pramāṇaviṣaya” iti matam bauddhānām /
SA19tarkrsau:3401_0: aparāparapratyayayogena jāyamānaṃ bhūtalaṃ 'kiñcit saghaṭaṃ kiñcit sadhaṭādanyadi'ti
SA19tarkrsau:3401_1: bhāvarūpatayā tadākārānu kāriṇā pratyakṣeṇānubhūtaniścitaṃ sasahāyatayā saghaṭapratyayanibandhanam /
SA19tarkrsau:3404: 5] ghaṭavān vā na bhavatīti pratyayadvayanibandhanaṃ nirūpyate /
SA19tarkrsau:3411: tathā hi 'ghaṭo 'tra nāstīti buddhinibandhanatayā na kalpanāmarhati /
SA19tarkrsau:3418: na sidhyatyeva tarhi niyataṃ viśeṣaṇaṃ viśeṣyaṃ ca rūpamiti kiṃ kasya viśeṣaṇaṃ viśeṣyaṃ vā ?
SA19tarkrsau:3425: viśeṣaṇaṃ viśeṣyaṃ vā pratyakṣeṇa ca tadākārānukāriṇā tadanyena vā pratyayenābhūtaṃ niścataṃ viśeṣaṇāntaramantareṇa /
SA19tarkrsau:3430: 'iha bhūtale kalaśo 'san' iti pratyayo na bhūtalamātraprabhavo,
SA19tarkrsau:3434: bhyāṃ yathāsaṅkhyaṃ ghaṭavatyapi prasaṅgasyābhāvasvīkārasya ca duratikramatvāt /
SA19tarkrsau:3446: aparāparapratyayayogena saghaṭād bhūtalādanyadeva bhūtalaṃ niyatapratibhāsavaśena vyavahṛtam /
SA19tarkrsau:3451: 'yaḥ svabhāvaḥ satsvartheṣūpalambhapratyayeṣu san pratyakṣa eva bhavatī 'tyādi vistarastu prasiddha eva /
SA19tarkrsau:3462: kāryasvabhāvahetuvidherbhinnābhinnasvabhāvasya sādha kau tenopeyasya bhedādupāyo vidhisādhanau bhinnau /
SA19tarkrsau:3465: yasya yatrāyattaṃ svarūpaṃ sa āpattiviṣayaṃ sādhayati /
SA19tarkrsau:3468: taccāyattatvaṃ kārye tvakāraṇena karttavyatve sādhyasya ca svabhāvatve vispaṣṭamucyamāne sphurati /
SA19tarkrsau:3473: svabhāvapratibaddhatvaṃ hi vyāpakasya tatra bhāva eva 'vyāpyasya vā tatraiva bhāva' ityevaṃ lakṣaṇānvayavyatirekalakṣaṇo 'vinābhāva ucyate /
SA19tarkrsau:3479: tathā --- tasyāpi hi kāryamevātha ca vyabhicarati bahnim /
SA19tarkrsau:3504: ramo hi rasaneva pūrvakaṃ gamayati svopādānam /
SA19tarkrsau:3507: 6] taḥ sa pravṛttaśaktirūpopādānarūpasahakārikāraṇo raso rasaṃ janayati / na kevalaḥ /
SA19tarkrsau:3510: nacānumīyamānam samānakālatayā rūpamanumāpakasya rasasya kāryahetutāṃ vyāhanti /
SA19tarkrsau:3512: svabhāvahetoḥ kṛtakatvasya “hetupratyayairi''ti vyatiriktaṃ viśeṣaṇaṃ na svabhāvatāṃ nirākaroti --- tathehāpi nayo veditavyaḥ /
SA19tarkrsau:3519: jalasya punaḥ sthairyamupārjitamādhāraṇātaḥ sthiraṃ jalamādhāraṃ gamayati /
SA19tarkrsau:3521: yat punaḥ kāraṇaṃ kāryasya na gamakam,
SA19tarkrsau:3533: yattvaśakyaṃ tathā gantumiti doṣo na tasya saḥ /
SA19tarkrsau:3552: paratve hyanumānaṃ yat sāmarthyāt tad bhaviṣyati /
SA19tarkrsau:3553: ko hi hastagataṃ dravyaṃ pādagāmi kariṣyati[515]? //
SA19tarkrsau:3561: apratibaddhaśaktikaṃ hi kāraṇaṃ yena pratyakṣānupalambhena paricchidyate,
SA19tarkrsau:3565: tena kāraṇasyāpi gamakatve kāryatvameve[516]'ti bhede sati gamakaṃ nānyadityuktaṃ bhavati /
SA19tarkrsau:3579: tādātmyaṃ sugamaṃ neti gamakatvaṃ na vidyate[517]/ /[518]
SA19tarkrsau:3613: yasya yena saha tādātmyatadutpattī na staḥ,
SA19tarkrsau:3619: svabhāvahetāvantarbhāvitvāt tattādātmyalakṣaṇaḥ pratibandhavyāpakakāraṇānupūrvī ca tādātmyatadutpattibalādeva kāryavyāpyayornivṛttiṃ sādhayataḥ,
SA19tarkrsau:3637: 8] bdhereva sā bhavatīti pratiṣedhasiddhirapi yathoktāyā evānupalabdheriti siddham /
SA19tarkrsau:3646: pariṇāmena yogyatābhājo yogiprabhāvādvā stambhitajñānaśakterghaṭasya ghaṭate kathaṃ bhūtale pratiṣedhaḥ ?
SA19tarkrsau:3650: yogināpi indriyasya viṣayasya vā jñānajanana śaktistambhasambhavāt /
SA19tarkrsau:3720: tato viruddhayā upalavdhyā kāraṇādyanupalavdhyā ca yeṣāṃ pratiṣedha uktasteṣāṃ dṛśyānāmeva smṛtānāṃ pratiṣedhasiddhiḥ /
SA19tarkrsau:3722: na pūrvaṃ, na tadā nīṃ bā dṛśyāstato na viṣeddhavyāḥ /

SA19tarkrsau:3799: piśāco vā śaśaviṣāṇaṃ vā na bhavatīti /

SA19tarkrsau:3862: jāyate ca śaraḥ śṛṅgāt jāyate ca śarādapi / /
SA19tarkrsau:3867: agnīndhanasāmagrījanyo yādṛṣo dhūmo na tādṛśa eva dhūmād bhavati /
SA19tarkrsau:3875: tadanya ādya eṣāparāgnīndhanādisāmagrījanya' iti tādṛśasya dhūmasya dhūmāt sambhavābhāvāt /
SA19tarkrsau:3894: satyeva yasmin yajjanma vikāre vāpi (+yā ?) kriyā /
SA19tarkrsau:3910: “yaḥ śubhāśubhakarmaṇaḥ karttā na sa phalasya bhoktā --- ataḥ kṛtanāśākṛtābhyāgamadoṣaḥ /
SA19tarkrsau:3918: iti naiva pravartteta prekṣāvān phalalipsa yā /
SA19tarkrsau:3927: kṣaṇānnānāgatān nātītān na varttamānatāvantaṃ kālamanavasthiteḥ kāryajanma /
SA19tarkrsau:3931: [555] tadeva kāraṇaṃ mātrakam // ta- sa- 169 pṛ-, 487 kā- /
SA19tarkrsau:3941: jñāturekasya sadbhāvād dvibhede tu kathaṃ bhavet[557]? //“
SA19tarkrsau:3961: tasmāt--- niyataṃ prāgbhāvitvaṃ kāryāpekṣayā kāraṇatvam --- na vyāpārakāritvam,
SA19tarkrsau:3973: atrāpi niyatatvaṃ bahnāveva sati bhāvakāryasya dhūmasya /
SA19tarkrsau:3976: sa ca niyamo bhāvo hetubhāvā bhāvābhyāṃ kāryabhāvābhāvau viśiṣṭau /
SA19tarkrsau:3978: 4] bhāvābhāvau viśiṣṭau 'sarvatra deśe kāle ca sarvadā vahnināntarīyaka eva dhūma' ityavadhāraṇāt /
SA19tarkrsau:3980: na ca sarvajño 'sau na ca na gṛhlāti kāryakāraṇayor niyamam ?
SA19tarkrsau:3981: yadi hi dhūmo nāgnijanyastadā sakṛdapi tato na jāyeta ?
SA19tarkrsau:3989: yadi nīlo dṛśyamāno 'yaṃ deśāntare kālāntare vā na nīla ihāpi varttamāno na nīlo dṛśyeta /
SA19tarkrsau:3991: 'dhūmo 'yaṃ vivakṣitadeśakālayoḥ[562]pāvakānantaraṃ niyatabhābīti bhāvito[563]deśāntare kālāntare ca nānyathā śaṅkanīyaḥ /
SA19tarkrsau:4003: [564] atra sa iti visargarahitaḥ pāṭho mūlapāṭhe /
SA19tarkrsau:4011: pra- vā- bhā- 133 pṛ-, 180; 643 pṛ- api /
SA19tarkrsau:4031: 'pi tena pāvakasya śakramūrdhnaśca yadi śaktirekā dhūmajananaṃ prati,
SA19tarkrsau:4033: tadā --- 'dugdhavāriṇoreva naiva śaktiyoge 'pi pāvakaśakramūrdhnorekarūpatā syādi'ti nirākṛtam ---
SA19tarkrsau:4058: vastūnāṃ vidyate tasmāt tanniṣṭhā vastuni śrutiḥ[572]/ /“
SA19tarkrsau:4060: [572] vastūnāṃ vidyate.... .... śruti vā- bhā- 361 pṛ-, 3/163 kā- /
SA19tarkrsau:4073: 'na bhinnalakṣaṇatvād yā pratyabhijñā viruddhadharmādhyāsaśūnyaviṣayā sā pramāṇam /
SA19tarkrsau:4075: tatra viruddhadharmādhyā saśūnyaviṣayatvaṃ pratyabhijñāyāḥ kena siddham ?
SA19tarkrsau:4090: [576] anenaiva kṛtaṃ karma .... ....bhabiṣyati // --ta- sa- paṃ- 166 pṛ- /
SA19tarkrsau:4092: mahitatvānyadvyāsajjyādivicāramavadhūya viśiṣṭahetuphalābhāvaniyatarūpāṇāṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ prabandhamekatvenādhyavasīya sa evāhaṃ karomī 'ti vyavaharati yuktameva pravarttate /
SA19tarkrsau:4162: dṛṣṭā śaktirmatā sā cet saṃ[586]vṛtyāstu yathā tathā[587]/ /[588]
SA19tarkrsau:4182: tādṛśāmādikāraṇaṃ tādṛśaṃ sarvathā dṛṣṭaṃ kāraṇaṃ na vyabhicarati kāryātmā [P6A]6] na tu yajjātīyaṃ kāryaṃ tajjātīyameva kāraṇamapi /
SA19tarkrsau:4197: anuvarttakaḥ kāryasya svabhāvo 'nuvarttanīyo yaḥ sa kāraṇasvabhāvaḥ /
SA19tarkrsau:4219: kāryamutpadyate yasmāt sa kāryotpādo yogyatāyāḥ svabhāvaḥ /
SA19tarkrsau:4221: 6] tpādanayogyatvasya sādhyasya sāmagrīsādhanadharmasattāmātrabhābitbena samagrasya hetoḥ sādhanatayā sammatasya svabhāvahetutvamuktam /
SA19tarkrsau:4223: [595] vo iti likhitvā okāramātrā chinneva mūlapāṭhe /
SA19tarkrsau:4229: tadūrdhvam ---bhāratasyānubandhino dharaṇi-dhāmādayaḥ kāryotpādāt pūrvaṃ sahakārivyapadeśabhājaḥ parasparopakāritvena ekakāryakāritvena ca /
SA19tarkrsau:4250: tasya matāntare ca pratibandhavaikalyayoḥ sambhavena kārye kāraṇānāṃ vyabhicāraḥ /
SA19tarkrsau:4255: yogyatāyāmapi ātmīyābhiniveśapūrvakā rāgādayo na dehendriyabuddhimātrā bhavitumarhati /
SA19tarkrsau:4259: dehādīnāṃ hetutve 'pi na kevalānāṃ sāmarthyamastīti vipakṣavṛtteradṛṣṭāvapi śeṣavadanumānāt saṃśayaḥ /
SA19tarkrsau:4286: kadācid dveṣasyāpi snigdhaṃ rūrkṣa ca vacanaṃ kāryam /
SA19tarkrsau:4287: ataḥ, kāryamātrād vacanamātrād rāgasya viśiṣṭasya kāraṇasyānumānaṃ pramāṇābhāsam rāgamantareṇāpi vacanasya sambhavāt /
SA19tarkrsau:4289: pakvānyetāni phalāni madhurarasāni vā samānarūpatvādekaśākhāprabhāvād vā upayuktaphalavat /
SA19tarkrsau:4315: sarva eva vastusambandhā janakasyeva prayogaviśeṣavaśāt pravibhāgena kāryakāraṇabhāvād vyavasthāpyante /
SA19tarkrsau:4330: yaḥ punaraviśeṣeṇa sarvasya tasya kāraṇamātrādeva bhāvo,
SA19tarkrsau:4335: dṛṣṭanivṛttīnāṃ vā bhāvānaṃ yathā nāśo hetvantarānapekṣo janmānantaraṃ vyavahtriyate /
SA19tarkrsau:4339: rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānānāṃ prakārāṇāṃ vināśadarśanena teṣu ca [607]deśakālāntariteṣu yadi kṛtakeṣu śaṅkā syād dṛṣṭasteṣāṃ sbabhāvena vināśo virudhyeta /
SA19tarkrsau:4347: yadi nāma kālo nāma mahābhūtādivyatirikto nāsti tathāpi taireva vyavahāro bhaviṣyati /
SA19tarkrsau:4358: yato rūpādīnāṃ yadi deśakālāvasthāsu kāsu[609]cideva vināśaḥ syāt,
SA19tarkrsau:4359: tadā tatsāpekṣo vināśo nirapekṣatayā pratīto na syāt /
SA19tarkrsau:4393: tasmāt sarvasya bhāvasya sambandho nāsti bhāvataḥ /“
SA19tarkrsau:4398: “rūpaśleṣo hi sambandho dvitve sati kathaṃ bhavet ?
